basic_info.name: ACET Scholarship
description: All the students belonging to BC / EBC /Disabled Welfare / Minority Welfare whose family income is less than Rs. 1.00 lakh per annum are eligible to apply for scholarships whereas SC/ ST students can also apply whose family income is less than Rs. 2.00 lakh per annum.

Section.name: About ACET
Section.description:
Aditya College Of Engineering and Technology - [ACET] was established in 2004, and runs under the aegis of Sarojini Educational Society. The college is situated in is situated in a serene, scenic campus in Surampalem.
ACET AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
